About

My journey

Hi, I'm Killian — Data Scientist passionate about Agentic AI, multi-agent systems, and building autonomous agents.

After studying Sports Science (STAPS) and completing a Bachelor's in Data Science, I pursued a Master's in Data Analysis, which I will finish by the end of 2025. I currently work at Median Technologies, where I've developed intelligent automation solutions and AI applied to medical imaging.

My specialty: designing intelligent autonomous agents capable of reasoning, collaborating, and executing complex tasks. I use frameworks like LangChain, LangGraph, and advanced LLMs (Claude, GPT) to build RAG systems, multi-agent workflows, and intelligent automation tools.

On the personal side, I created DataSentinel AI — an intelligent monitoring system using autonomous agents to analyze and monitor data pipelines. I'm also developing Data Quality Agent, a specialized agent for automated data quality analysis with intelligent report generation.

My goal? To build AI agents that augment human intelligence and automate complex tasks. I'm looking for opportunities to develop high-impact agentic AI systems, where agent autonomy enables solving real-world problems at scale.
